mean_en: a very firm request for something; something that somebody needs; things that somebody/something makes you do, especially things that are difficult, make you tired, worried, etc.; the desire or need of customers for goods or services which they want to buy or use
sentence: He has always demanded some unreasonable requests from his children.
sentence_trans: 他总是要求子女们满足他的无理需求。
word_etyma: de加强 + mand命令 → demand要求
